```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```



```{r}
dakarRally_bikes_data <- read_csv("Dakar Rally/dakarRally_bikes_data.csv")
```


```{r}
dakarRally_bikes_data %>%
  group_by(Team) %>%
  summarise(count = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(count))
```

# Question 1

```{r}
dakarRally_bikes_data %>%
  lm(Rank ~ Team, .) %>%
  summary()
```
